title: The Allmoods Cookbook, First Volume
description: The Allmoods Cookbook offers a humorous approach to helping people improve or "snap out of" a bad mood and enjoy or enhance a good one through their everyday cooking and dining experiences. Positive, practical and fun, this beautifully illustrated volume is a great conversation piece for a coffee table, as well as a useful resource for the kitchen.
author: Evelyn Elgin/The Kitchen Therapist
